plot: When 20-somethings Brad and Tina decide to take the plunge, and move in together, they quickly discover it's not easy. Much to Brad's dismay, his best friend, Scotty, predicted the inevitable battle of the sexes.
title: Moving In
plot_es: When 20-somethings Brad and Tina decide to take the plunge, and move in together, they quickly discover it's not easy. Much to Brad's dismay, his best friend, Scotty, predicted the inevitable battle of the sexes.
plot_en: When 20-somethings Brad and Tina decide to take the plunge, and move in together, they quickly discover it's not easy. Much to Brad's dismay, his best friend, Scotty, predicted the inevitable battle of the sexes.
